website_summaries.verdict: Black-seed-oil-infused, 1-inch ceramic iron helps keep the moisture locked in and makes hair shine. Dual voltage makes it compatible for worldwide use.
pros: Easy to use with comfortable soft-touch grip
Stands out for ceramic plates infused with black seed oil to lock in moisture
cons: Slightly overpriced compared to other models

customer_reviews.title: Buy this straightener!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best straightener I have ever used! It runs very smooth on the hair. I have very thin hair but I have a lot of baby hairs that will stick up a lot and my pervious straightener did not flatten them down, but THIS straightener makes them disappear as if they aren't even there! Also your hair will not get tangled in it and it leave a very beautiful shine! I can't stop touching my hair after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Thrift

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this iron
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this iron! It makes my hair nice and smooth and two days later it's still pin straight without having to iron it again and I have a slight curl to my hair when it air dried. I highly recommend much better than the Chi.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased flat iron in April, 2016. Worked great until May of 2017 when one side of the iron completely stopped heating up. For this price it should definitely last longer than 1 yr.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long ....
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for a few months but only used it a hand full of times. Plugged it in the morning and started to use it and it started popping and sparking and smoking. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mehler

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & easy to use to curl or straighten ur hair
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first one I bought. I had to buy me another one when my first one was stolen. Didn't think twice about buying the exact same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Amada

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love this flat iron. The best by far and lasts for several years before I had to replace it with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING AFTER 4 USES
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked it but it broke after using it FOUR times. I don't normally straighten my hair so not used often. Recd as a gift in Aug. 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: The reason i looked into buying it was because it was listed on best of beauty from Allure
customer_reviews.text: I have used more flat irons in one life time than most people. Even though this has the Kardashian name on it, this is a quality flat iron. The reason i looked into buying it was because it was listed on best of beauty from Allure. I tried it, and it gets really hot and works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: I just love it.
customer_reviews.text: I just love it.. Its works great for my hair. I recommend to buy this product, it has got adjustable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: M Vandhana Ramya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase and all items were delivered without delay, thanks..love Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price- not as good as it gets but def gets the job done well
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Bazin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrible
customer_reviews.text: I paided a good amount of money for a Kardashian Beauty flat iron and I receive this garbage I’m so glad I opened it before I gave it to my mom for mother’s day I would have been so embarrassed and even more upset than I am right now if I was able to review this product with out giving it a star I would .!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Elizzarrarz

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product! Received it first week of January of this year and 4 1/2 months later it's not working! It gets worse. I cant even return it because of Amazon's return policy. This is why online shopping isn't all it's cracked up to be. Now I'm out the price of the product. Very unfair.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt tug on your hair at all, it's super easy on it and does an amazing job at the same time. It also has a long cord which is nice so you're not grounded to the outlet. Heats up really fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my flat iron :) Use it daily. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The best flat iron ever I love it.. As much money as it is, it's so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Valenti

customer_reviews.title: Handle gets hot!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the handle gets pretty hot. I have to switch the way I hold it, but other than that it's a good lil flat iron
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in April and it's already gone out. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in April and it's already gone out. What's the point in spending this much for a straightener that doesn't even last a year?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This straightener works great but after just a few months of use I ...
customer_reviews.text: This straightener works great, but after just a few months of use I started to hear a popping sound, and sparks started to come out of it.
customer_reviews.author: nwonder87

customer_reviews.title: Best flat iron!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this flat iron! it works beautifully on my hair. Heats up in under 30 seconds and makes my hair shiny and soft after using it! It is great for curling hair as well. The product also has a temperature control setting so you can control how much heat you want to use on your hair. Love the smooth texture of it and love the chic matte black and pink color as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this flat iron. I have long thick curly hair and it doesn't take that long to straighten my hair. Also heats up quickly! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Been using it everyday since I got it, I love it. No frizz, very straight hair that lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: bitbots

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: I read a review... And I agree this flat iron is the best of both words. I did my research and yes this is a product of chi ! By the way, the feeling of the flat iron is so smooth that never bothers my thumb like other flat irons.. Therefore I recommend it ! you may be having second thoughts because it's "Kardashian" but I'm proud of the way the flat iron turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Keylin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: REALLY surprised by how much I like this Flat Iron. I went from a Paul Mitchell to this, and I don't notice a difference. I have thick, wavy hair and would buy this product again and again for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love...love. Great instrument. Been using the paul mitchell for years this one is so much better
customer_reviews.author: ida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this iron so much. I have really thick wavy hair, this iron is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Eileen  stoops

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and loved it leaves hair sleek and soooooo shinyyyyyyyy loved it a lot and so light weight
customer_reviews.author: spoiled_doll

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: i bought the blow dryer too. Quality high end product made by CHI, good price for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Malissa T.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. My new fav.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a 200$ flat iron for an non expensive price. Even greater if combined with the black seed oil. Definitely will stick to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the most skillful person when it comes to doing my hair, but this straightener is very easy to use and gets the job done quick! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: The produce came on time and was in a nice box and was great
customer_reviews.text: The produce came on time and was in a nice box and was great, but only lasted about 4 months before breaking.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Best one ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best flat iron I have ever owned. I had a Chi before and it did not work this well. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also noticed that it does not leave a burnt smell on my hair like other irons ive used
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on magazine, I purchased it. It leaves hair very soft and heats up really fast. I also noticed that it does not leave a burnt smell on my hair like other irons ive used. After I flat iron my hair, it still smells like shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: VSN

product_meta.title: Kardashian Beauty Flat Iron, 1 Inch, 1.87 lb.
product_meta.description: Instantly create sleek and smooth hairstyles with the Kardashian Beauty 1" Ceramic Hairstyling Iron. It features 1" ceramic plates infused with nourishing black seed oil for incredible shine. Designed with extended 4" long plates to provide more styling coverage in a single pass, this iron quickly and easily styles multiple hair types.
